column1: These are the properties that are application-specific. The files will be located in the TecsysWeb.war/WEB-INF/classes/ApplicationSettings directory beneath the deployed environment and will be called [application].properties (e.g. meta.properties).

column4: Contains parameters used by the EliteSeries Web Components Database Upgrade Utility.

The upgrade step that the xyz database must be at in order for the application to run.
The xyz database may be any of meta, dms, wms, tms, or other.
major identifies the highest level of the upgrade step, minor identifies the lower level of the upgrade step, and custom identifies the custom level of the upgrade step.
The class name for a given key.
The class that should handle requests when no action is specified for a given servlet.
The class that should handle requests for the specified action for a given servlet.
The class that should handle errors for a given servlet.
